Record Date:May 14, 2025.

Rights Entitlement Ratio:One rights equity share for every eight fully paid-up shares held.

Issue Opening Date:May 22, 2025.

Issue Closing Date:June 6, 2025.

Mahindra & Mahindra Financial Services Limited (MFSL) announced a rights issue on May 8, 2025 . The company offered 15.44 crore fully paid-up equity shares at an issue price of Rs 194 each, including a premium of Rs 192 per share.

This rights issue was intended to raise â‚¹2,996.16 crore, according to Bajaj Broking and Groww . The proceeds were aimed at strengthening the company's capital base to support future growth and meet regulatory capital requirements.
